title: Conservative Critics Lobby For An Early End To Export-Import Bank
teaser: The U.S. Export-Import Bank now finds itself embroiled in controversy. New House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy announced his support for letting the bank's charter expire, and only days ago, news surfaced that four officials at the export credit agency are facing allegations of misconduct.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
